Name: Olaf D
Title: Best choice for a taxi in Jodhpur!
Review: When we planned our stay in Jodhpur, I randomly googled a taxi company to arrange a pick-up at the airport. Later, when it became clear that we would stay in Jodhpur and drive to the wedding in Pali each of the two days, we got in contact again and arranged also those trips. As we had to buy some local dresses for a wedding, our driver was also available to pick us up at the hotel and organize all the places we wanted to go to. We expected a taxi, what we finally got, was a very motivated and friendly driver who did not only drove us around, but a go-to person that took care of all the small things and questions we had as India newbies. I warmly recommend the company and especially the driver Digvijay. So, when you are in this area and need transportation plus perfect service around in Jodhpur, Rajasthan get in touch with this company.

Name: Vikas P
Title: Jaipur to Delhi travel
Review: Had an excellent experience with the ride I took with family. The driver Firoz was professional, the car was clean and comfortable, and the ride was smooth and efficient. Highly recommend!

Name: Anurag T
Title: Very nice
Review: Rajputana cabs provide a good Innova crysta and a very good driver Mr Varinder Singh. He was very flexible with the time and places for sightseeing and was also knowledgeable about local traffic situations that helped us plan better. Ms Divya from their sales team was helpful. I paid extra amount by mistake and Mr Tarun from their transport team immediately refunded back Overall good experience.

Name: Ravneet singh
Title: Wonderful
Review: We had a wonderful experience with rajpurtana cabs. Specially the guy RAGHUVEER SINGH who dealt with us so politely and patiently.

Name: utkarsh m
Title: Jodhpur to Jaisamer taxi ride
Review: Driver was very polite and friendly. He came on time and even waited for 45 mins very politlely while we came down. The pricing was also very reasonable.

Name: Francisco Garcia
Title: Excellent.
Review: Very good service from Delhi to Agra, we were at all times safe and comfortable! The driver was amazing.

Name: eztravel394
Title: Poor experience
Review: We took two trips. One was a 5 day multi-city trip and another was a one way drop. If we had only taken the first trip my rating would have been 2-2.5 stars.Pros:+ They are one of the few cab companies who responded when we asked for a quote 2 weeks before travel during peak season. + They are not the lowest priced (some aggregators beat them) but they were somewhere close to the lowest quotesCons- Terrible response after you pay the advance. For Trip 1 they asked me to call back 2 days back. After multiple calls/whatsapp the driver contacted me the previous day evening. For Trip 2, the driver called me 1 hour before and I was relying on this service to drop me at Delhi airport to catch a plane!- Cars that were assigned were bad. The cat assigned to the first trip was bad. The one assigned for the second trip was terrible. It has more than 250000 kms broken rearview mirrors and severely dented back. It was stinking of cigarette smoke. - Drivers weren't very professional. Issues included  sending whatsapp messages while driving, giving excuses to take the car inside busy parts (driver asked us to go by auto), etc. Summary: If you want something on the cheaper side Rajputana cabs is an option, but you may find other aggregators. If you are looking for good service, clean cars and professional drivers look elsewhere.

Name: Nivedita A
Title: Shimla-Manali trip
Review: Our cab driver Pawan ensured we had a very comfortable journey - he was very knowledgable with the sightseeing hotspots and navigated hill driving very well. He played a vital role in ensuring our holiday experience was a memorable one.

Name: Mkhan
Title: Dodgy behaviour for a top rated cab company
Review: Dealing with a highly rated cab shouldn't come with hassles.. My cab was assigned by a Dashrath Godara.. It was not a licensed taxi but a private car. The driver told us to say this was my brother's car in case the cops stop us. The driver was not very confident and even lost his way on the way to Jodhpur.Towards the end of the trip it turned out that Dashrath had provided the wrong drop date for the tour and the driver insisted that we were to end the tour a day early..this was despite my having confirmed the dates on chat (screenshot attached).Dashrath said he'd provide us the drop the next day but he didn't, instead asking us to get a taxi from the hotel and reimbursing it. Following up with Dashrath for the reimbursement has been met with radio silence.Overall, i would not recommend them at all and would say it's better to go via a trusted Travel agency or aggregator.

Name: Isaac
Title: Superb experience
Review: The car was arranged in advance, and we even got a better car than expected. The Driver Lal Singh was also very friendly and provided a smooth experience. Highly recommended

Name: Sanjay Ray
Title: Awasome experience
Review: It's a great experience in Rajasthan tour ..24 th to 29 th Dec 2022.The service of "Rajputana cab "was just mind-blowing. Spacially the response of CB sing is awesome.any time any where he always guide us.it was very good experience with our driver come guide brother Tejpal..he is very gentle,caring and lovely person.overall very good experience with Rajputana cab.. thank you Rajputana cab for providing us this kind of service..

Name: Rahul D
Title: Wonderful experience
Review: Quick cab service provider. Stick to his commitment in peak time as well. There were no cabs available during Christmas season but Rasputin cabs managed the show well.

Name: Globe_trotter_20221
Title: Excellent service!
Review: We booked cars through Rajputana cabs almost on a daily basis during our trip to Jaipur recently.Mr. CB Singh organised the bookings smoothly for us. The drivers were always very polite and punctual. The service charges were also very fair!We had a trip to Agra organised by some friends. On the day of departure, we were informed at 6am that the program had been scrapped. We were left to organise our own transport and had big bags to compound the problem.I called Mr. Singh at 8am and requested a last minute booking for the trip. He managed to organise the same very quickly. We had a car at the hotel at 10:30am, as desired! The driver was very polite and the car (Toyota Innova) was excellent! The entire trip was very pleasant!I'd like to thank Mr. Singh for his services and also make a special mention for the last minute rescue for Agra trip!I will be using his services for all future trips, as well as advising family and friends too!

Name: Dustsettler
Title: Irresponsible and unsafe
Review: They will lure you in with cheap prices, contract your trip out to 3rd party and not take any responsibility for anything that happens on the trip. They squeeze both the customers and the contractors hard to make money. Avoid and rather pay more for a more responsible and safe operator

Name: Simon33715
Title: Excellent, professional taxi and guide service
Review: We arranged a 9-day tour around Rajasthan with Rajputana Cabs (run by Mr Singh and Mr Singh), with a car collecting us at the airport in Udaipur and taking us to Jodhpur, Jaipur and Agra (UP), ending with our departure from Agra airport. The days not travelling were used for sightseeing and, for each destination, Rajputana provided professional guides for the sightseeing days, each of whom was excellent, and that worked extremely well.  The car, a Toyota Innova Crysta, was large and comfortable and our driver, Peekay, was very competent, professional, punctual and friendly, his skills being very important with some of the road situations one encounters on that route.  This all meant we had a fantastic time.  If there were room for one slight improvement, it is that the Mr Singhs are men of few words, which led to a bit of unnecessary confusion on a couple of occasions, but did not adversely affect the overall service in any significant way. Without hesitation, I would thoroughly recommend using this company.

Name: Deepak Patel
Title: Clean and neat car with excellent drivers
Review: Very Neat and clean cars. Driver are very cordial and on time. I strongly recommend you to take their services for Delhi Jaipur or other places . Thank you for making our trip super comfortable..

Name: Ashish Chaturvedi
Title: Very good and enjoyable trip
Review: We went to a trip from Jaipur to Alwar we had a awesome trip. The tempo traveler provided by Rajputana cabs is very good and driver behavior is also very good. At the last I can say that I fully recommend you all to choose rajputana cabs for trip.

Name: Mrunali Ghorpade
Title: Good service and Affordable rates
Review: We booked a cab from rajputana Cab services.The journey and cab service was up to the mark. Price was affordable.We didn't had any complaints with driver, He gave us alot of information about the city and it was good experience.

Name: Neeraj
Title: Misguided information over cab timing
Review: I was interested to go to chowki dhani and decided to hire vehicle. At the time of booking, the personnel said that chowki dhani timing is from 5-11 pm and taxi will be available for us till we intend to stay in chowki dhani. I make partial payment of Rs 500/- as Booking charge . The vehicle came at about 5.30 and since i was travelling with kids, we got late and started our journey. Surprisingly, the driver told the moment we sat in vehicle that we can spend only 2 1/2 hr only in chowki dhani and 1/2 hr can be added further. We reached at 7 pm and driver keep calling us at 10 to come out. Really frustrating. Definitely not up to mark . They say they are govt registered but need to review their staff behaviour and false commitments.

Name: vaibhav s
Title: It was very good
Review: We find one other best and professional cabs service in jaipur,car provided were nice and clean nature of the driver was very friendly and rates for the cars are very reasonable.

Name: S Sethia
Title: good experience
Review: Was a good experience. The driver was nice and drove well without any glitches in the journey. There are hidden toll taxes but he warned me before hand. They can also sleep overnight in the car if needed. The experience in booking was also smooth.

Name: Manoj Kumar
Title: Amazing and satisfied Experience
Review: We were a group of four adults and a 3 year old kid. The Vehicle we booked was Innova but alloted vehicle was Hyundai Alcazar.Ms Divya Singh helped us to book the car hassle free and enquired through out our trip for any help or assistance.She was very helpful and time-bound for giving the quotes and queries.The car was very nice and brand new.The driver Azad Singh was also very gentle and helpful.Our 13 days trip was a memorable one.Appreciating your efforts.I personally recommend your firm to our friends and colleagues and will definitely meet for our future trips.Manoj Kumar M

Name: Adil D
Title: Rajputana cabs review
Review: This is my second trip with Rajputana cabs. This time travelled with them to delhi-agra-mathura-vrindavan and back. It was a pleasant experience. coordinator Bhavana managed things with ease ensuring that the trip went smooth. Thanks for the good service.

Name: Bidisha D
Title: Good travel experience
Review: The cab arrived at the exact time. The driver too was polite and professional. Highly recommend and will definitely travel again with Rajputana.

Name: Satya
Title: Awesome experience
Review: The booking was easy, they were flexible about no advance requirements. The driver was very friendly and professional. Was flexible both ways while traveling from Delhi to jaipur and after few weeks back. Response time was good. Overall it’s a thumbs up 👍🏻

Name: Srikanth Adhyatmabhattar
Title: Excellent service
Review: We booked a taxi Swift desire on 8th November 2022. Driver Sultan Singh was alloted to us by C.B Singh (owner of Rajputana cabs). He was on time during our pickup from the hotel where we were staying. He also gave a brief overview about each sightseeing we visited which helped us a lot and suggested to visit places which were not in our itinerary. In short very good service.

Name: donald
Title: Cab
Review: The booking was simple process and value for money. Roop Singh picked us from airport worked as guide and driver . His driving skills are good and smooth

Name: srirammiyer
Title: Visit to Jaipur
Review: I was exploring cabs for Jaipur city tours and Pushkar and came across Rajputana Cabs through Google. I called them and they gave me a good package for my tour. The best part is they give you a complete package inclusive of parking and toll charges which I did not find in others cabs  companies with whom I had enquired. One the day of arrival they sent me a Toyota Etios (me and my mother were travelling). Our driver Roop Singh was very courteous. He showed us all the places and also guided us throughout the 4 days . He also advised us where to take guide and where not too as at some places tour guides were not required. He also took us to the shopping places which were the local shopping places and we got good stuffs. Overall Roop Singh was a great help to us in guiding us over the tour. I recommend Rajputana cabs for your tours in Jaipur

Name: Priya
Title: Best service
Review: Best service ,on time, driver was very cool, calm & polite. Very friendly. Prices are also genuine. Driver,. Driving skills was very 👍

Name: RGathani
Title: Unreliable agency - Backs out from agreed prices and car type at the last moment!!
Review: Had pre booked a cab with deposit for four people with luggage from Jaisalmer to Jodhpur.They sub contracted to some local vendor. The local guy demanded higher price then the pre agreed one !!! Had to escalate the issue and waste time to resolve it while on trip. They then sent a car with inadequate trunk space. Inspite of sharing pics they did not accept their mistake neither did they refund deposit money. Had to book another another cab - luckily got one else would have missed my train. Pathetic experience

Name: N B
Title: Excellent
Review: Mr. Bhanwar was an excellent & knowledgeable driver! Condition of the cab was very good! Thank you for your service & help!

Name: Sagun Joshi
Title: Excellent guide cum tour
Review: Excellent service. I had booked luxury car for Jaipur tour about a week before. Since then they are in contact regularly. We had very limited time in Jaipur to visit and journey began early in the morning at 4:45 AM. The car was already in the station before we reach. In 2.5 hour tour he showed us entire Jaipur. Our driver was Dilip Singh. He is so professional, he not only show us Jaipur but told us the entire history. I strongly recommend this cab service to anyone. And , BTW, I also noticed same name being used by others in some site. So be careful to select the original one for genuine service.

Name: Paresh Saxena
Title: Trustworthy Service!
Review: Clean cars, and service you can trust! Prices were better than most places that I searched. Driver on the way back from ranthambore to Jaipur airport was driving like he’s driving an ATV on a bumpy road. I was bouncing all over the place in the backseat!

Name: Giuseppe V
Title: Trustful and fast
Review: The communication/booking was supper easy, the driver was on time, car was comfortable, highly recommended, great service!!

Name: Subramanian R
Title: Very satisfied.
Review: Nice coordination by Ms Divya and has very well organised our trip frm Chandigarh to Ludhiana and Delhi -Mathura-delhi sector.Drivers were very supportive too.

Name: sanricksan
Title: Best Commuters in RJ
Review: Mostly new set of cars and the drivers are gentle. Long journeys can be comfortable with Rajputana Cabs.

Name: Anushka
Title: Great service! Highly professional. Smooth driving. ArvindJi is great and has serval good stories to narrate.
Review: Great service! Highly professional. Smooth driving. ArvindJi is great and has serval good stories to narrate.

Name: Rohit R
Title: Excellent service
Review: Highly recommend their service. Have booked multiple Rajasthan tours with Rajputana cabs and can vouch for their excellent service, especially Mr Dashrath.

Name: Brijendra Singh
Title: Very Professional & Polite
Review: The cars are neat clean and drivers are very polite. Very upright, professional and reliable services. The final bill I had was within the original estimate. Most recommended if traveling with family.

Name: Akansha gupta
Title: What a trip  !!!!
Review: It was are best trip...and Inderpal uncle was was humble nd he was take our care like parent...he guided us in a best way...and for other trips also..we will contact them...tarun and bhawna maam thanku...

Name: Utkarsh gupta
Title: Best manali trip
Review: Loved the experience. Our driver bhaiya was really amazing , he is quite knowledgeable, polite and took a really good care of us. I will recommend to all my friends and family members.

Name: fabrice c
Title: Trip between Jodhpur and Jaisalmer
Review: Booked two trips one from Jodhpur to Jaisalmer and another one on return. Trips were ok and drivers as well. Globally good even if on return, driver had difficulties to reach hotel.

Name: Arun.S
Title: Good experience on our Rajasthan trip
Review: We hired a cab from Rajputana Cabs for our 8N/9D family (2 adults and 2 kids) holiday tour of Rajasthan with the following itinerary - Airport (Jodhpur) -> Jaisalmer -> Jodhpur -> Udaipur -> Jaipur -> Jaipur Airport.We had a single driver (Jodhraj ji) and cab from start to finish. The service offered was excellent. We were driven around for both inter-city travel and within the city site-seeing. The driver was always on time for picking us up and was also very knowledgeable about the sightseeing places guiding us where/what to see. All through the 9 days the family felt very comfortable with the driver and did not have any issues.Overall I would recommend Jodhraj as a driver for anyone visiting Rajasthan through Rajputana Cabs.

Name: Kansara
Title: Jaipur
Review: Very good service, very good driver,. If you are in Rajasthan Rajputana travel is one of the best option

Name: Soni Jose
Title: What a tragedy
Review: Booked cab for Shimla visit with exact hotel name and itinerary and paid 500 Rs as advance as requestedWhen requested for driver number, they can share it only evening before the travel date and agreedAnd number was shared evening by 8'O clockBut when contacted driver to share the hotel details for pick up, he was confused and requested to contact RajputanaSo again called the lady in charge and the reply was hotel is not in the location as they expected, should charge Rs 2000 more and agreed to refund if no service required. I was travelling with family of 3 kids and no choice to reject , so agreed with half heart under standing they were cheating as all the details were shared when cab was booked. I was not convinced that they will send the taxi, so some how managed another  taxi as it was almost 10'O clock evening. They refused to pay back advance saying they arranged  another taxi.

Name: Bhumika V
Title: Clean tempo traveller and a great driver.
Review: We had booked a tempo traveller for 8 people all senior citizens, they were all happy with the 4 day journey. Had a great experience. Thank you Rajputana cabs.

Name: V Nambiar
Title: Jaipur trip
Review: 5 star service from Rajputana cabs.... we had a very good experience.   Thanks to driver Bablu ...  Was a great trip 👍👍👍👍👍

Name: Umesh Dubey
Title: Amazing trip....
Review: I recently booked round trip from Jaipur to Khatushyamji.Excellent customer service...Car condition was good and driver behaviour also good. Thank you...

Name: Raja.p
Title: Never recommended
Review: Overall experience was bad..not proper service..Never recommended..Condition of car not good , ac not working..

Name: Kamal verma
Title: Service beyond expectations
Review: Service beyond the expectations. Very good service. Our cab driver Mr. Ravi is very responsible. When my daughter missed her bus from banasthali to jaipur he helped her too much to reach jaipur to catch next bus on time with full responsibility.Thanks a lot Rajputana cab and Mr. Ravi

Name: Sam S
Title: The Taxi was the key to our amazing trip
Review: Amazing week in Jaipur was made possible by Rajputana Taxi. Rajkumar was an amazing driver and found us an excellent Tour Guide for our trip. The car was excellent and comfortable. He took us to visit his family and also drove us to Agra and Dehli. Amazing time - thank you

Name: KIRTI
Title: Excellent services
Review: Best experience with Bhupendra ji from rajputana cabs.. he gave every small details about heritage culture.. well spent day

Name: Heena T
Title: Best service 🤗
Review: Excellent service by Mr. Bhupendra Singh ji....he is  professional and gave necessary guidance for your travel needs. He even direct the nicest restaurants.

Name: Yateesh
Title: Honest, humble, prompt and excellent service
Review: Finally a cab service that actually is not out to fleece folks. Mr. Dilip Singh is an awesome guy. He owns the service and is so very humble. He couldn't find a driver to take us to the airport. So he drove us personally. You can see he genuinely wants to help folks. His pricing is very reasonable. Too bad we discovered him on our way out of jaipur. But hopefully of we visit any other part of rajasthan in the future, we will definitely call Dilip.

Name: Mayank Rawat
Title: Great Experience
Review: We had a great weekend with Mr.Ajay .The best person in town to go out and have trip. He was very friendly and polite and told many things what to do and which will be the best time to go for which place . I hope to see him next time as well .Thank you Rajputana cab for his service .

Name: Nitesh Goyal
Title: Thanks to Rajputana Cabs for their reliable service!
Review: A huge thank you to Mr.CB Singh for arranging for cabs for our local travel in Jaipur. During our visit,  mobile internet was shut off by the government, due to which life was obviously quite difficult, but the drivers provided by Mr. Singh were top quality, and knew their way around the city well. Highly recommended!A special shoutout to our driver, Mr. Sultan Singh for his hospitality.

Name: Hina
Title: Rajputana cabs
Review: Rajputana cabsMr. Bhupendra singh helps us to with perfact suggestions and good locations.Thanks to Rajputana.

Name: Fenyshah
Title: Mr. Bhupendra Singh
Review: Excellent service by Mr. Bhupendra Singh from Rajputana cabs and he helps us with very good suggestions.

Name: Khilna Haria
Title: Highly Recommend
Review: Highly Recommend.......Excellent service and even the driver was very cooperative and he made sure we didn't miss any of our sightseeing.

Name: Satya
Title: Family friendly and flexible - great experience
Review: We travelled this month from Delhi to Jaipur and was a great experience. I booked it for 11:30 pick up at Delhi international airport. A day before, the flight got rescheduled. Informed the cab company and they said no worries driver will pick u at 4 pm rescheduled time, which he didWas very friendly to stop for any small family need purchases as needed like water snacks or bio breaks and to not stop even though there were key milestone stops if asked not to stop (my kids were sleeping)Was able to drive safely and within 5 hours or so to JaipurThey even gave additional discount Recommended ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

Name: Azeemaimran
Title: Had a great trip
Review: Had a great trip with them. The driver was polite. They charged only what they told told. Nothing extra was charged. The price was nominal. Really thank you.

Name: Sandip Patel
Title: So happy !! 🙂
Review: We have got a very nice facility. The driver and the car were very nice. We are happy with their service and will be re-booking from here and will suggest others to book from here as well. Ms. Divya ma'am  so supportive and kind for booking. we are  very great full with their services.

Name: Adil D
Title: Good experience with relatively competative price. The coordination Divya was able to setup everything quite well. Drive
Review: Good experience with relatively competative price. The coordination Divya was able to setup everything quite well. Driver too were friendly and cooperative

Name: Samir Pandey
Title: Char dham trip
Review: I experienced professionalism in dealing with them. Their arrangements in terms of quality and worth are appreciating. Quite satisfied with coordination of Ms. Divya.

Name: Karmrajsinh
Title: Awesome Journey with Sandeep Singh
Review: It was a great and safe journey with family. Very co-operative team of Rajputana Cabs. It was a nice experienced

Name: Prateek
Title: Excellent CABS
Review: Car was clean and comfortable  with excellent driver . Driver was on time . Reached destination on time

Name: Shailendra Baghel
Title: Excellent service and good driver.
Review: We took the services of Rajputana cabs from Chandigarh to Manali and back in a 5 days tour. Highly recommended. 5 star experience. Driver named as "Lucky" from Ludiana was quite friendly . He was familiar with all places in & around Manali.I will definitely use your service again. Your service, and reliability, made a long stressful journey end positively. Driver was punctual.Driver got in touch really early to make arrangements of where and when would be best to meet us , and then stayed in touch with us throughout our trip.Lucky was friendly.Would highly recommend the service to anyone.

Name: hemant kumar meena
Title: Upender Singh cab driver
Review: Upender Singh driver of rajputana cabs has excellent knowledge of rajasthan history. Very good cab driver friendly and hospitable as well.

Name: sahayj29
Title: Excellent service, good car and driver.
Review: Had booked a Crysta for one way from Jaipur to Jodhpur on 28th April 2022. They sent a nearly new vehicle so we had a comfortable and cool journey. The driver was superb and guided us during visit to Ajmer en route.

Name: Subir R
Title: Simply Great.
Review: Well behaved , punctual drivers, very efficient office staffs, always available at your service. Very clear communication and never missed commitment.

Name: GK Rao
Title: Excellent Service
Review: Excellent service by Rajputana Cabs, Mr. CB Singh and Hemanth Kumar. They took good care of the tour plan as per schedule and guided us properly. Thanks to Rajputana Cabs.

Name: Manav S
Title: Jaipur journey
Review: Excellent service by bhupender singh. He very good knowledge of history of Rajasthan. We enjoyed jaipur journey with him. He is so kind and good at explaining historical places of Rajasthan

Name: Basant
Title: Manali Experience
Review: Booking experience was smooth. Driver was timely available each day and was fully aware of the local places to visit. The standard trip duration however can be shortened from 3 days to 2 days.

Name: Vadloori Karthik Babu
Title: Good and memorable experience
Review: Glad to have chosen this service. The driver was timely and professional. But we faced a little arrogant behaviour from the same. Do groom your drivers on that aspect and everything else is fantastic.

Name: YASHAWANT SANE
Title: Very efficient and prompt service
Review: Ms.Hina Chaudhary (Rajputana cabs) was cooperative for booking  driver Mr.Raju Rai was good decipline driver

Name: muzir
Title: Good
Review: Trip was hassle free and our tour guide cum driver Mr.Bhupender singh made it a good and wonderful day, he was punctual, obidient, friendly and helpful, had a good time with their service, its affordable

Name: Swati k
Title: Excellent service by Bhupendra singh from Rajputana cabs
Review: Excellent service by Bhupendra singh from Rajputana cabs. He came on time and explained many things about jaipur while on the cab. Had a relaxed and great time due to him in jaipur.)

Name: prateekdoppleganger
Title: Great services. Good and generous drivers.
Review: Driver Ravinder Singh Shekhawat is a very well behaved and good driver. Rajputana Cabs provides excellent service all over Rajasthan. Everytime I visit Rajasthan i hire their cabs. From Jodhpur,Jaisalmer,Udaipur,Chittorgarh,Bikaner,Mount Abu,Jaipur i have always trusted them. During my Jodhpur Jaisalmer Longewala trip Driver Chhatar Singh was also very well behaved and generous.

Name: Ramiz
Title: Excellent
Review: They gave us great experiences. Mr Bhupinder , our cab driver, was very honest man. He gave us many historical information prior to our guide. He indeed is talented. He helped us when we lost our phone. Fortunately we got the phone back. He is simple. He is a down to earth man and jovial. I will recommend if anyone is hiring rajputana cabs in jaipur for sight seeing, they should take Mr Bhupinder.

Name: Dhawal Grover
Title: Excellent serviceMr. Bhupendra SinghRajputana cabs Excellent knowledge about historical period and he is of very polite nature H
Review: Excellent serviceMr. Bhupendra SinghRajputana cabs Excellent knowledge about historical period and he is of very polite nature Had a great time with Mr. Bhupendra Singh

Name: Deep D
Title: Rajputana cabs excellent service by Mr Bhupendra singh
Review: An excellent trip in jaipur which was kindly elaborated by Mr.Bhupendar singh who was very kind and generous. He got a nice knowlegde about historical monuments and forts in jaipur. Got good history skills. Had a great time with him anyone can recommend him for their tour.

Name: Shrabanti
Title: Excellent Trip
Review: Excellent Trip.. Mr Bhupendra Singh. Rajputana CabBhupendra ji is a very reliable person and also knowledgeable person if you want to know about Rajasthan. He is a nice person. If you want to take Rajputana Cab for Jaipur sightseeing please take Bhupendra ji as a driver. the rate is also minimal.

Name: ranjita g
Title: Baraat Car
Review: I booked car ( Audi A4) for my brother’s wedding in Jan22. The whole experience was very professional and seamless. Car arrived on time and was very clean. Driver was very helpful and accomodating to our needs during the wedding.

Name: Vinay
Title: Best experience. Definitely recommended
Review: We had hired Rajputana CAB service for 13 days. Trip includes sightseeing of Jaipur, Bikaner, Jaisalmer, Jodhpur and Udaipur cities. Our CAB driver NAVARATAN SIGH RAJAVAT was very helpful, punctual and explained us most of the things we should know as first time visitors. Also he was very professional and well behaved. CAB(Swift Desire) was also very neat and clean.Rajputana CAB service representative HEENA guided us for planning the entire trip. She was in touch with us for continues feedback.It was a very good experience with Rajputana CAB and happy with service. Definitely recommended.

Name: Papu B
Title: Trust them they're good and professional
Review: Overall it's a good experience, most of the process is online and professionally managed, hence i don't face any problem in availing the service. Ms Hina assisted me during the entire process and Mr. Ram sing our driver was a gem.

Name: mehul kabrawala
Title: Rajputana cab is really Rajputana 👌
Review: Very good & Very safe Cab Service. Car is in very good condition.  Most important they provides me well behaved & knowledgeable driver. Thank you Rajputana Cabs & special thanks to medam hina chaudhary for making my trip memorable.👍

Name: Sonali Korgaonkar
Title: Excellent service
Review: Excellent service, From pickup to boarding from Jaipur to selected place. Making your journey memorable. Service by Bhupendra Singh. Great tourist guide & down to earth nature. Really thankful for your service 😁👌.

Name: Pooja M
Title: Excellent
Review: Excellent love the network, speed of arrangement & quality of service! Only people to book with in Rajasthan!

Name: Shreya Dhole
Title: Reasonable and Reliable Cab service
Review: It was a very wonderful experience to travel with Rajputana  Cabs.In 2020 we traveled to Pushkar,Ajmer,Kumbhalgarh,Ranakpur and Jodhpur with Rajputana with senior citizen,the drivers are very polite ad go out of the way to make your journey a memorable one!Last week we were travelling to Kishangarh and Ajmer from Jaipur on a all girls trip,it was an impromptu plan,they provided the cab on a short notice and this time again the we had a pleasant experience.They drive very smoothly and also inform you about the history of the place and also about the local food you should try.Coming to prices,its very reasonable as compared to other taxi services,trust me we had contacted a lot.So definitely go for Rajputana Taxi Service.

Name: PC
Title: Fabulous Trip
Review: Took a local cab service for exploring manikaran kasol from Miss Anjali Singh.it was a memorable day. driver was awesome well planned tour. Big thanks to Anjali Singh and her team.

Name: lucky
Title: Good and great Service with reasonable price
Review: The service was arranged by Anjali on a short notice and we were very happy with the service provided, we would recommend to our friends about Rajputanaa Cabs.Driver was very friendly and nice to us...Keep doing good..Much appreciate the service which was provided to us on short notice on New year peak time, with reasonable price.

Name: megha r
Title: Terrible
Review: We booked a taxi with rajputana cabs in jaisalmer with a drop to jodhpur.We spend almost 4 days with this taxi operator. It was one of the most horrible experience we had, I asked for a sedan but they gave an innova saying they didn;t have a sedan due to peak season and i  agreed for the innova with X amount, which was a bit high , i agreed as i was travelling with my mother in law and daughter. When we reached jaisalmer we were welcomed with 2 Dezires mentioning that their innova met with an accident , once we reached jaislamer town we were forced into one car , i was assured that from the next day innova will be ready. Come the second day there came a ETIOS that too late by more than an hour the driver had some excuses when i asked about innova a new story was given to me and i spoke with their representative via phone who was telling some other reason .The driver all through the journey mentioned that they will not be able to provide innova for the local tours and will provide one during our return to jopdhpur.The driver was mostly on phone and was mostly interested in commissions he gets and was asking for bills from where we shopped...etc...Come the third day a Dezire came that too late by 90 mins gave some lame reasons.Yes more thing i had to pay tolls and parking charges but these guys told that they rates are inclusive.Come the fourth day ETIOS came that too a bad vehicle and once again late by 120 mins.This impacted our program in jodhpur as we reached jodhpur late .Finally when it came to settlement he was asking 2k on top of what was asked for innova, i had to fight with the person and settled for a lesser amount.I was messaging and speaking to him multiple times all through the 4 days and everytime he was only telling lies.Very bad service , pathetic cars , unprofessional service and over priced.Better avoid this cab service as they seem to tell only lies and extremely unprofessional.

Name: Arpita M
Title: Highly recommend
Review: Our experience with Rajputana cabs was awesome. Anjali mam was always available for any questions and she assured us about best service. Driver was very polite ans cooperative and very professional. Thank you for making our trip successful and taking memories back home . Thanks Anjli Singh, driver Bittu and driver Sukhvinder Singh.

Name: Sshhiivvaanniiii
Title: Rajputana cabs
Review: Service of Rajputana Cabs was very nice. They cooperated very well. Our trip was arranged very well without any trouble. Driver was linent. Zoya mam cooperated and responded on time and her service was good.

Name: Manish S
Title: Great service
Review: Great experience overall. Drivers are helpful and very courteous. Timely pickup and drop. Highly recommend overall.

Name: Akshay
Title: Jaipur-Udaipur-Ranthambore trip
Review: Our journey was very good. Driver was excellent took us to all the beat places. Felt safe travelling with him.

Name: pujaa
Title: Airport Tranfer
Review: I came across this cab service on Google. I wanted a clean sanitized big car with vaccinated driver for tranfer to the Indira Gandhi International Airport as I wS traveling with my family. Miss Zoya helped with best choice of car available at 3 am in the morning. The price were very competitive with personal service. The driver came before time and was very polite. I would definitely chose there service again.

Name: Eswar
Title: Jaipur one day sightseeing tour
Review: Had a good experience with the service.Driver Sultan singh was good. Was able to recommend good places and cab was well maintained, hygiene. Highly recommended.

Name: Aqip
Title: Good
Review: Thank you zoya for giving me a save and a best service. Excellent service by herAnd A great thanks to her driver Mukesh

Name: Farzana G
Title: One of the best Jaipur car rental company
Review: Sultan was our guide and driver for the 3 days. He is a very knowledgeable and friendly guy. While we had a draft itinerary to see multiple things, Sultan suggested we make minor changes to it so that we could see all the places of interest without getting too exhausting. Overall er spent a good 3 nights at Jaipur and Sultan made it extra special for us.
